Class CityDiscount

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.DatabaseItem
      • domain.AbstractDiscount
        • domain.CityDiscount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDiscount<City>

    public class CityDiscount
extends AbstractDiscount
implements IDiscount<City>
    This class represents a Discount which is based on the City of destination.
    Author:
    Gaston Lemaire

        public City getCity()
